name: Schwalbe Marathon Winter Plus SmartGuard HS 396 29in.
description: Retain full control on icy roads, even in tight turns and under hard braking. These studded tires make your winter rides safer. The spikes work best on ice when running at minimum pressure. At maximum pressure, the tires can be ridden on ice-free roads with minimal noise.RaceGuard belt offers protects against penetration punctures, while only minimally increasing weight and rolling resistance.Reflective lines for visibility on long winter nights.Spikes have a tungsten carbide core for durability.To ensure that spikes are permanently fixed, tires should be run in for about 40km on asphalt while avoiding any fast acceleration or heavy braking.
